intro: Immerse yourself in the search for hidden objects challenge.
description:
Take a break from daily the hustle and bustle, enjoying exciting adventures with improved graphics and more detailed locations! 
Spend unforgettable moments away from the hustle and bustle of the city hiking, horseback riding and boating. 

Use your skills and knowledge to find all the hidden objects and complete mini-games.

Game features:
- COMPLETE LEVELS IN DIFFERENT MODES! The hidden object scenes are presented in three different search modes. Complete them all to collect the maximum number of stars and unlock all locations!
- DEMONSTRATE YOUR HIDDEN OBJECT FINDING AND PUZZLE SOLVING SKILLS! Travel and meet adventures and outdoor activities! Play your favorite mini-games and find objects by silhouettes!
- COLLECT ALL THE SOUVENIRS! There are many souvenirs hidden at the locations that will serve as a reminder of your journey through amazing locations. Be careful and try to find them all!
